mapper.select: SELECT mem.userid , nickname , bankName , account , regdate , preLoginDate , auth , accountNonLocked , enabled FROM dk_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN dk_member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userId}

select count(*) from dk_member
userId like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
nickName like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select cash_num , regDate , cashAmount , specification , userId , nickName , cashKind from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(dk_cash pk_cash) */ rownum rn , cash_num , regDate , cashAmount , specification , userId , nickName , cashKind from dk_cash where (specification = '미승인' or specification = '승인완료') and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from dk_cash where specification = '미승인' or specification = '승인완료'

select report_num , reportKind , reportingId , reportingNick , reportedId , reportedNick , board_num , reason , regDate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(dk_report pk_report) */ rownum rn , report_num , reportKind , reportingId , reportingNick , reportedId , reportedNick , board_num , reason , regDate from dk_report where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.delete: delete from dk_member_auth where userId = #{userId} and auth = #{role}
mapper.update: update dk_member set accountNonLocked = #{accountNonLocked} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
update dk_member set accountNonLocked = '1' WHERE USERID = #{userId}
update dk_member set cash = cash + #{cashAmount} where userId = #{userId}
update dk_member set cash = cash - #{cashAmount} where userId = #{userId}
update dk_cash set specification = '승인완료' where cash_num = #{cash_num}
